name: Weapons Simulator 3D
description:
The objective of this demo is to create a realistic weapons simulator, by using real ballistics and a wide range of modern weapons. All technical information is provided and then calculated in-game to create the singular behavior of each weapons, all by scripts.

Overall:

8 Pistols

11 Submachineguns

10 Rifles

5 Machineguns

2 Snipers

4 Carbins

Total 40 weapons plus a Hand Granade!

You can download this full simulator for free!!

Also, check out these other projects from Maloke Games!
